body:
No rape instant x100 better
Cosplay scene was perfect

Okay, I just hate the guy that tried to rape our mc, and I hate him a lot, so I cannot get hard to him no matter how cute of a girl he looks like. Otherwise the art and sex scenes are pretty great so I give it a 5/10 bc the stupid mc horny friend.
This is H E A V E N

I'm very thankful who translated
One of my fav of this year

Okay, TG consent rating.

It has avoided the rape scene, so that is good, instead the story goes for Sex Scene 1: A yuri scene of consent between the MC and his girlfriend, there is no complaints here as this only consent.

Sex Scene 2 on the other hand has the MC being tricked by his friend posing as someone else of the girl's life, into sex. But even after this revalation, the MC still goes on with this, which would be considered cheating (but his GF forgives him, and proposes a threesome so in hentai logic it's all okay now). This makes the overall thing although a bit iffy, still technically consent.

So, I'd rate this overall a 9/10. Strong on the consent, but a misstep here and there for the sake of a narrative. Cannot wait to see the third part.

This is one of the best thing I read, it focuses more on story which for hentai is very hard to do. It'll probably be over in the next one so I can wait until then, this takes the second spot on my made up "best series on this site."
Bruh, I've been waiting for this.

So.... 
We are waiting for the threesome?
what am i even doing in this website.
